titleInfo.title: Santana Universal Tone Tour at Beth Woods

mods.abstract: Two color window card (yellow and red on white) announcing Santana with Steve Winwood at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts on July 17. Poster features a woodcut of a banjo.

subject.topic: Bethel Woods Center for the Arts
